name: Red Leaf
description:
Stepmania/Tap Tap Revenge style game for the band LOST, though it only includes one song.

Programming: Alex Spedding http://alexdiru.com/
Art: Grant Norris http://grantnorris.co.uk/
Music & Art: LOST https://www.facebook.com/lostband

Controls:
Same as Tap Tap Revenge, tap the buttons when the notes come, and hold the buttons when the notes have trails
Tap the top half of the screen to pause it, and the same area to unpause it

Known bug(s):
-Changing from the game window during the 3, 2, 1 countdown and then changing back will cause every note in the song to be missed
